description: Three major acquisitions and two significant funding rounds make up the transactions featured in the Deal of the Year category at the 2025 GeekWire Awards. The award, presented by Wilson Sonsini, is aimed at recognizing deals that had a significant impact on emerging Pacific Northwest companies. The finalists include Jama Software, Lexion, Smartsheet, Stoke Space and Truveta. Seattle startup Rhythms was the Deal of the Year winner last year after raising a $26 million seed round for its platform that connects to various systems inside a company and uses AI to analyze
title: GeekWire Awards: Key acquisitions and big funding rounds lead Deal of the Year category
